Trigger.name: Trigger 1
Trigger.Query: INSERT INTO mod_db_export.cnldata (datetime, cnlnum, val, stat) VALUES (@dateTime, @cnlNum, @val, @stat)

Trigger.name: Trigger 2
Trigger.Query: WITH upsert AS (UPDATE mod_db_export.cnldata SET val = @val, stat = @stat WHERE datetime = @datetime AND cnlnum = @cnlNum RETURNING *) INSERT INTO mod_db_export.cnldata (datetime, cnlnum, val, stat) SELECT @dateTime, @cnlNum, @val, @stat WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM upsert)

Trigger.name: Trigger 3
Trigger.Query: INSERT INTO mod_db_export.events (datetime, objnum, kpnum, paramid, cnlnum, oldcnlval, oldcnlstat, newcnlval, newcnlstat, checked, userid, descr, data) VALUES (@dateTime, @objNum, @kpNum, @paramID, @cnlNum, @oldCnlVal, @oldCnlStat, @newCnlVal, @newCnlStat, @checked, @userID, @descr, @data)
